name: db-astro-suite
description: A suite of Astro tools with Python backends and Go generators.

scripts.build: pnpm -r exec rm -rf dist && rm -rf dist && pnpm build:hub && pnpm build:starwizz && pnpm build:merge
scripts.build:merge: mkdir -p dist && cp -rf hub/dist/analog/public/* dist/ && cp -rf tools/starwizz/dist/starwizz/browser/* dist/starwizz/ && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html
